DYNS 592.title: Special Interest Group Research Seminar
DYNS 592.prereq_description: Only students in the Dynamical Neuroscience Program may register for this
DYNS 592.description: Research seminar for special interest groups in dynamical neuroscience.

DYNS 596.title: Directed Reading and Research in Dynamical Neuroscience
DYNS 596.description: Provides supervised experience in experimental design and laboratory procedures on selected topics, including the formulation of experimental problems, discussion of relevant literature and the analysis and interpretation of experimental results.

DYNS 599.title: Dissertation Research and Preparation
DYNS 599.description: Empirical and theoretical investigations of special problems in dynamical neuroscience in relation to dissertation research.
